item.description:
OK, here's a twist. Have you been to The Gaslight in the evening? It takes on a wholly different look than the atmosphere at the brunches. The lights are lowered and it becomes a rather romantic gathering spot.

 

Come join us on the evening of the 25th, come early to sample some appetizers (courtesy of the Sitzundjibers), join us for a glass of wine (or two) and chill! Evening conversations are even more animated than those you may have experienced at the brunches...and as always, there is FREE parking!
item.why: Start the week off with enthusiasm
item.name: An Afterwork @ The Gaslight
